name: Karasuno Walk
description:
In collaboration with Design Weeaboo and BIM & ArchViz by Sheena, Karasuno Walk is a fan-made detailed 3D model of the Karasuno High School campus grounds from the manga and anime Haikyuu. With just your smartphone, you can now explore around the boys' volleyball club room, gym, and more through the teleport buttons or just take a literal walk around the whole space yourself. Oh, be on the lookout for some easter eggs too!

This was a project from 2020. Can only be played in an android phone via Google Playstore (see link below).
